  1. åŠ å¯† (Encryption):

  4. ç£ç›¤åŠ å¯†ï¼š åœ¨æ•´å€‹ç£ç›¤æˆ–ç‰¹å®šå€åŸŸä¸Šæ‡‰ç”¨å°ç¨±è§£å¯†ï¼Œä»¥ç¢ºä¿å­˜å„²åœ¨ç¡¬ç›¤ä¸Šçš„æ•¸æ“šåœ¨æœªç¶“æˆæ¬Šçš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹ç„¡æ³•è¨ªå•ã€‚

entry.title: ã€HTMLã€‘-Enter Key Hint
entry.content:
å‰è¨€

æœ€è¿‘çœ‹åˆ°æœ‰ä¸€ç¯‡æœ‰é—œEnterKeyHintæ–‡ç« ï¼Œæ•´å€‹æ‰‹ç™¢è·‘å»ç©ç©çœ‹ï¼Œå®˜æ–¹èªªæ˜é€™æ–¹å¼æ˜¯é‡å°è™›æ“¬éµç›¤æ‰æœƒå‡ºç¾çš„æ•ˆæœï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹é¢è¡¨æ ¼:

KeywordDescription
enterThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜enterâ€™, typically inserting a new line.
doneThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜doneâ€™, typically meaning there is nothing more to input and the input method editor (IME) will be closed.
goThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜goâ€™, typically meaning to take the user to the target of the text they typed.
nextThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜nextâ€™, typically taking the user to the next field that will accept text.
previousThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜previousâ€™, typically taking the user to the previous field that will accept text.
searchThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜searchâ€™, typically taking the user to the results of searching for the text they have typed.
sendThe user agent should present a cue for the operation â€˜sendâ€™, typically delivering the text to its target.
